description: Patagonia's Boardshort Logo Uprisal Hoody is made of 100% recycled knit fleece that has a brushed interior and natural stretch. By utilizing fabric scraps and recycled bottles, this garment reduces their reliance on virgin materials.
name: Patagonia Boardshort Logo Uprisal Hoody - Unisex

specs.value: 11.5-oz 55% postconsumer recycled polyester, 45% recycled cotton knit fleece with a brushed back
